item.title: Deriving the Discrete Fourier Transform (DFT) from the Continuous-Time Fourier Transform
item.author: horgan098@gmail.com (Emmet Horgan)
item.description: A derivation of the DFT starting from the Continuous Time Fourier Transform

item.title: Chirp Z Transform FFT Algorithm
item.author: horgan098@gmail.com (Emmet Horgan)
item.description: An explanation of how the Chirp-Z transform FFT algorithm, also known as Bluestein’s algorithm, works with an emphasis on convolution and equivalence
